personalInfo.description:
I am a Software Engineer who is apassionate about Web Development. I started doing sites in Microsoft Frontpage hosted in Geocities, and now I make systems and webapps synchronized in various servers who can connect to a database or a little gadget that I did with Arduino and show data in real-time with an API that I built.

I always have been a self-taught person and I like to be in constant knowledge of web technologies. I love programming, I'm the kind of geek who would rather spend time programming a bash script to improve his life.

I also love JavaScript and my favorite web framework is Node.js with Backbone but every day I fall over React. I am delighted with the Internet of Things and the Maker movement, in my spare time I build things with Arduino or the SparkCore.

I like teaching, it's my way to give back what I learned, this is why I am member of the JavaScriptMX community where we promote events like the Nodeschool and Noders where I can teach to people interested in learning Node.js.

school.name: Superior School of Computer Sciences (IPN - ESCOM)

projects.name: Lantern
projects.description: Build the new interface of Lanter Desktop app with React, Webpack and NPM scripts

projects.name: Prixz
projects.description: Build an API for a pharmacies network around the country, manage user access and geolocated products with Elasticsearch.

projects.name: Grillo
projects.description:
I built the Grillo Active prototype with Node.js and SparkCore, a revolutionary earthquake early-warning system for 1 billion people.
We are creating the largest seismograph deployment in Mexico.
After trialing we will deploy to protect vulnerable cities around the world.

projects.name: Vive Latino
projects.description:
The site of the Vive Latino Festival from 2014-2015 editions.
I did everything about web development (backend and the frontend) for the website also I did a lot of servers configuration and  maintenance.

projects.name: Noders
projects.description: I organize a programming community where we meet once every month to talk about things we can do with the Node.js framework while we drink some beer.

projects.name: Doctor Experto
projects.description: A directory where you can easily find and rate a doctor with details and opinions of other professionals and patients (Beta).

projects.name: Instantdrive
projects.description: A webapp where you can order a test drive online, the app tracks your path from a GPS and shows them in realtime, also you can share your video experience.

projects.name: Aerom√©xico
projects.description: I was frontend developer of the Aeromexico's home page and the Club Premier's website application, optimizing load times, layout and UX.
